title: Babymetal – Metal Forth
description:
Babymetal
Metal Forth
They may not have saved the world, but the new Babymetal record is an absolute hoot, finds JR Moores
Like Bill and Ted’s Wyld Stallyns, Babymetal were supposed to have saved us by now. They promised to unite the world through peace, love…
